about_the_game:
Are you brave enough to go Beyond the Pines?


Beyond the Pines is a first-person, story-driven psychological horror game that delves into the unbreakable bond between an owner and their dog.

Meet Sam Carvel, an isolated writer who finds solace in the ancient forest and the companionship of his beloved four-legged friend, Rocky - a rescued German Shepherd cross Belgian Malinois. Sam and Rocky have been inseparable since Rocky was a puppy, adventuring side by side until now...something has disrupted their bond and separated them.

Set in the haunting wilderness of Wales, players take on the role of Sam as he embarks on a desperate and emotionally charged journey to find his companion and uncover the truth.

Where's Rocky?


As the cold evening sets in, Sam makes his way back to his secluded cabin in the forest, eager to be reunited with his best friend, Rocky.

Upon arriving, he is met with a shocking discovery - Rocky is nowhere to be found, and there are no signs of his whereabouts. With the night closing in and the harsh winds howling, Sam is filled with worry and blames the weather for Rocky's disappearance.

But as Sam searches for Rocky, he can't shake the feeling that something sinister may be lurking just Beyond the Pines, taunting him.

In an intense and emotionally charged journey, Sam sets out to uncover the truth and find his beloved Rocky.

FEATURES


  • A First-person narrative horror experience: Play as Sam Carvell, coming home to his rescue dog, a German Shepherd cross Belgian Malinois named Rocky, and explores their story and bond.

  • Story-focused Exploration: Beyond the Pines encourages exploration of the environment and the elements that make up Sam's life in an emotionally charged experience.

  • An Immersive Cabin: Take a stroll through the forest to your isolated Cabin, but be careful what may have followed you home.

  • No Combat: Beyond the Pines is story-driven rather than combat-oriented, making the focus on the emotional journey and the unfolding of the story. However, you may feel like something is watching you.

  • Emotional Reflection: As Sam confronts his mind, you may reflect and begin to question your own emotional sanity.

  • Welsh Folklore: Beyond the Pines is influenced by Welsh Folklore and the beautiful landscapes of Wales, adding an eerie and unique atmosphere to the game.



Get ready to embark on an immersive and emotional journey as you uncover the truth and explore the unbreakable bond between Sam and Rocky in Beyond the Pines.
